lexUnit.name: sacrifice.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: the practice or an act of killing an animal or person or surrendering a possession as an offering to a deity.

sentence.text: Herbs are cast into the fire by the Lady of the Flowers in lieu of what may have been gory sacrifices by our sun-worshipping ancestors .
How do we know it would n't be a place of savagery and high priestesses and the ritual sacrifice of beautiful twelve-year-old boys ?

He also shared in the efforts to end child sacrifices which were eventually prohibited in 1803 .
